about_the_game:
WARNING

This game is only a demo and is NOT the final game. There´s a lot of things that will be changed. Now that that´s out of the way. Please enjoy this demo

Zruce Adventures is a 3D platformer with a spice of action game made set in a different world from ours. In it you will embark on a great adventure as you explore various places in North Island. The game is fully voice acted with side quests and optional content. Inspired by platformer games of the 2000's - early 2010's era or specifically, the PS2, Gamecube and Wii era of gaming.

The game has 3D platforming, open worlds to explore and action segments that will keep you entertained.

Story

In the year 2030 far in a research facility in sector 12 a experiment goes out of control making the facility blow into pieces, although something escapes from it... Years later in a island called North Island, a 18 year old folf who's name is Zruce is living a normal life in north forest. While heading to Legend City something strange happens, the forest he's in is being infested by robots, a meteorite strikes in the forest as Zruce hides from them, the meteorite contains a legendary sword known as the light blade, a weapon so powerful only a chosen one can wield it... apparently that chosen one is Zruce.

As soon as he grabs the blade he realizes the world is in big danger. A mysterious being is trying to take over the world with his army of robots and is planning on making a new one habited by only robots fully mechanized without any living beings. Zruce must now stop his plans and save the world before it's too late.

Along his way he'll meet new friendships and foes. He'll have to go to go from place to place trying to stop the mysterious evil being from destroying life as we know.

Features


This game has multiple features so the player has multiple things to do while in the game, some of these are:
  • Outfits
  • Secret collectibles
  • Open world
  • Side Quests
  • Massive story line set in an incredible fantasy world!

short_description: A brand new 3D platformer set in a fantasy world where an evil entity wants to destroy all life in the planet and make a new mechanized one. Solve puzzles, collect stuff and visit different places in North Island as Zruce to defeat this evil being before it's too late.
